### Normalization

First we calculate the percentage of mitochondrial DNA in each cell using a regular expression to identify mitochondrial genes. 

```{r}
sc_bc[["prop_mito"]] <- PercentageFeatureSet(sc_bc, pattern = "^MT-")
```
